Prof. Doutor Anibal Cavaco Silva2744-016 Porto Salvo, Portugalmanuel . lopes @ tecnico . ulisboa . pt Short info: I am an associate professor at Instituto Superior Tecnico and a senior researcher at INESC-ID.I am interested in understanding artificial and natural learning. Understanding learning gives amazing insights into human nature and will allow developing technologies to improve our well-being. To this end, I develop models of learning for animals and develop new learning methodologies for machines.
